feature.name: Range
feature.description: Difference in semitones between the highest and lowest pitches.

feature.name: Most Common Pitch
feature.description: MIDI pitch value of the most frequently occuring pitch.

feature.name: Most Common Pitch Class
feature.description: The pitch class that occurs most frequently compared to other pitch classes. A value of 0 corresponds to C, and pitches increase chromatically by semitone in integer untis (e.g. a value of 2 would mean that D is the most common pitch class). Enharmonic equivalents are treated as a single pitch class.
